headline: Bank Director's 2025 Technology Survey: Banks Grapple With Data, AI Maturity
summary: Bank Director, the leading information resource for directors and officers of financial institutions nationwide, released the results of its 2025 Technology Survey, sponsored by financial technology provider Jack Henry & Associates. The findings reveal how today's bank leaders think about data management, artificial intelligence, competitive dynamics and technology adoption.
